DOC.brief_title: Uncemented Total Elbow Arthroplasty Data Collection
DOC.detailed_description: The three part study : Retrospective Chart Review- A chart review complete patient uncemented total elbow arthroplasty use press-fit technique Vanderbilt Hand & Upper Extremity Center . The chart review include : - A historical data form - An operative data form - A radiographic assessment form Questionnaire Mailing- We mail prospective study patient DASH ( Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ) questionnaire complete mailing letter explain request information . The DASH modify ask patient regard pre-operative time well . Clinical Data Collection- We enroll patient already had/or uncemented total elbow arthroplasty use press-fit technique . If patient already file complete chart review complete historical data form , operative form , previous radiograph assessment . If patient file complete chart review data collection include : - An Informed Consent Document - A historical data form - An operative data form - A radiographic assessment form - Patient-completed DASH questionnaire - Elbow Assessment Form
DOC.criteria: Any patient total elbow arthroplasty use pressfit technique Vanderbilt Hand & Upper Extremity Center Patients le 18 year old For chart review postoperative enrollment patient must adequate radiograph .
